entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -19.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuaq Airport 3:48 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -19.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -25.1°C
Wind: W 17 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
